ygData.subject: Re: skills
ygData.msgSnippet: All skills show up forever at the trainer, even if they are maxed. If you try to train it, the guildmaster will say you have trained to the limit of your
ygData.messageBody:
All skills show up forever at the trainer, even if
they are maxed. If you try to train it, the
guildmaster will say you have trained to the limit of
your ability, or something to that effect. So the
answer is you can not go above, even if you do try and
train/spend pps to do it.

Eylena

--- Curtis Bennett <die_kluge@...> wrote:
> Even if I spend points into it? Has anyone tried
> that? I think I
> might do it. I'm pretty sure it still shows up on
> my training screen
> when I go to the guildmaster. Seems like I could
> spend the plat and
> raise it. It will certainly let me. I'll try it
> sometime, let the
> list know what happens.
>
>
> >From: AoS/Aosinator <darshan@...>
> >
> > >It's 75, actually. Can I take it past 75 by
> spending training points?
> > >You didn't answer my question.
> >
> >The maximum that a cleric can attain in dodge, is
> 75 I believe. Once it
> >reaches it's maximum, it can go no higher.
